amendment.description: To require a report on the use of explosive pest control devices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 59 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 59 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S832) To require a report on the use of explosive pest control devices.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 59 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 59 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Cochran.
